bug.author: Yancey1989
bug.summary: jupyter container failed when setup playground with multi-users mode
bug.description: After <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sql-machine-learning/sqlflow/pull/2552>#2552</denchmark-link> merged, the jupyter container failed as the following message: <denchmark-code> Warning Failed 9m33s kubelet, minikube Error: failed to start container "notebook": Error response from daemon: OCI runtime create failed: container_linux.go:349: starting container process caused "exec: \"bash\": executable file not found in $PATH": unknown </denchmark-code>
